wikipedia_page.main: Christopher James Hawkins (born 26 November 1937) is a British politician. He was a British Conservative Party Member of Parliament for High Peak constituency in Derbyshire from the 1983 general election until he stood down in 1992.

response: *Christopher Hawkins (born 1937), Conservative MP for High Peak 1983–1992

Hendry was elected to the House of Commons at the 1992 general election for the Derbyshire seat of High Peak following the retirement of the Conservative MP Christopher Hawkins. Hendry held the seat with a majority of 4,819.
